    • Method Detail

      • rollNumber

        public int rollNumber()
        Simulates the rolling of two dice
        Returns:
        The number rolled (sum of both dice)
        Precondition:
        It has to be the beginning of the player's turn
        Postcondition:
        an int (1-12) with the same odds as that of rolling two dice

      • playSettlement

        public void playSettlement(VertexObject vertex)
        Places a settlement for the player on a given vertex
        Parameters:
        vertex - the vertex where the player wants to place the settlement
        Precondition:
        The player has to have the resources (1 wheat, 1 brick, 1 lumber, 1 sheep) for a settlement and the vertex has to be connected to a player's road and at least 2 edges away from another settlement or city. And the player has a settlement left.
        Postcondition:
        a settlement will be placed at the desired vertex

      • playCity

        public void playCity(VertexObject vertex)
        Places a city for the player on a given vertex
        Parameters:
        vertex - the vertex where the player wants to place the city
        Precondition:
        The player has to have the resources (2 wheat, 3 ore) for a city and the vertex has to be connected to a player's road and at least 2 edges away from another settlement or city. And the player has a city left.
        Postcondition:
        a city will be placed at the desired vertex

      • playRoad

        public void playRoad(EdgeValue edge)
        Places a road for the player on a given edge
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge where the player wants to place a road
        Precondition:
        The player has to have the resources (1 lumber, 1 brick) for a road and the edge has to be connected to a player's road or municipality and the edge must not be occupied by another piece. And the player has a road left.
        Postcondition:
        a road will be placed at the desired edge

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard()
        Buys a dev card and places it in the players newDevCards list
        Precondition:
        the resources (1 ore, 1 wool, 1 wheat) required for a dev card and at least one dev card in the bank
        Postcondition:
        a dev card will be added to the player's newDevCard list

      • useDevCard

        public void useDevCard(Card card)
        Plays a dev card for the player
        Parameters:
        card - dev card the player wants to play
        Precondition:
        the player has to have the dev card that he wants to play in oldDevCards

      • offerTrade

        public void offerTrade(TradeOffer offer)
        Offers a trade to another player
        Parameters:
        offer - Trade that is offered (TradeOffer)
        Precondition:
        the player has to have the resources that they want to offer
        Postcondition:
        the trade is offered to another player

      • decideTrade

        public boolean decideTrade(TradeOffer offer)
        The player chooses whether or not to accept an offered trade
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer that has been given (TradeOffer)
        Returns:
        true if trade is accepted, false otherwise
        Precondition:
        the player has to have the desired resources
        Postcondition:
        the trade is either accepted or denied

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        Ends the player's turn and
        Precondition:
        It's the player's turn
        Postcondition:
        moves newDevCards to oldDevCards. Checks to see if the player has won (10 vicotry points)

        public int getCities()
